official_title: To amend the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to eliminate Congressional review of newly-passed District laws.

summary.text: District of Columbia Legislative Autonomy Act of 2011 - Amends the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to eliminate congressional review of newly-passed District laws.
